articles.title: Most Computers Work With 0 And 1. This Quantum Computer Takes It Beyond The Binary: Study - ABP Live
articles.description: Most of the quantum computers in the present day are designed with binary information processing in mind. Now, researchers have developed a quantum computer that takes it beyond the binary.
articles.content:
Most computers work with zeroes and ones, also known as binary information. From coffee machines to self-driving cars, almost every utility is powered by computers.
